posts.content:
A message for 16881956 from John Monek sent at 2025-04-03 05:50:02
             Message: Good Morning,

To separate ourselves from the herd applying for this WO, I would appreciate the opportunity to introduce ourselves.
	
We are both college educated network technicians, one being an engineer, offering decades of networking experience . . . I am sounding like a salesman . . . forgive me.   ;-) . . . intentional . . .  

We have  installed B2B Networks (e.g. rehabilitation centers, truck stops, et al), fiber backbones in corporate settings (Philadelphia, Baltimore, Harrisburg, etc.), Security System Access Controls such as card readers, mag locks, motion sensors, and security camera installs at fulfillment centers (Proctor and Gamble, Amazon, Geodis, Ryder,  etc.

We have performed POS Installations for numerous retail stores and restaurants.

We conduct hardware and wifi surveys. 

We have extensive experience in structured cabling standards (Fiber/Copper) and installations for residences, retail stores, and fulfillment centers. 

We would love to represent you for this WO!
	
Anyway, we do everything network related and without the need for REVISITS. I also provide extensive detail-oriented documentation and significant Deliverables of the SOW undertaken and completed. My partner claims I suffer from OCD . . . I may.

We perform all of our installs by the industry standards (e.g. TIA/EIA-568), et al.
	
We are reliable, experienced, and professional. Please consider speaking with us regarding this opportunity.
	
    
Thanks for your time and consideration. 


Take care, stay safe and have a wonderful day! 
Gratitude!

John Monek
(717) 740-7490
posts.author: Automated System
